definition: the fiery spray of molten steel
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Steel floral tube fracturing grouting technology is adopted in slop reinforcement of Shenzhen Buji eastern and western main-road.
sentences.chinese: 深圳布吉東西幹道邊坡採用鋼花管劈裂注漿技術加固。

sentences.english: Soit is good money spend good.
sentences.chinese: 因此，這就是好鋼花在了刀刃上。

sentences.english: How can steel flowers bear fruit?
